body.name: 2 PCS 4 Layers Baby Milk Powder Dispenser, Milk Powder Pots,Formula Dispenser Portable Milk Powder Formula Dispenser Container Pot Box Milk Cans Snack Storage Box for Travel (Four-Color)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 3 mins
features: Includes 2 PCS 4-layer food storage containers with enough capacity for your usage needs. Each layer can hold about 35-40g. Each pack of Formula Dispenser Container with Activities 4-Layer which can hold about 175-200g.
Size: 18.5cm x 7.5cm x4.3cm. (7.28 x 2.95 x1.69inch), compact and portable, ideal for babysitting, day care, at home and on the go. Premium quality BPA free PP material, dishwasher safe.
The 4 compartments of this milk powder dispenser can be combined in different order and in any number, and each layer can also be taken out and used independently.
Easy to separate compartments and lid to clean after use. Narrow footprint means it can be stored easily in buggy bags and bottle and coffee cup/drink holders.
Contact us:Please contact us if you have any questions
body.description: Size: 18.5cm x 7.5cm x4.3cm. (7.28 x 2.95 x1.69inch). Package: 2 pack (2 x 4-layer). Capacity: Each layer can hold about 35-40g. Each pack of Formula Dispenser Container with Activities 4-Layer which can hold about 175-200g. This 4-layer formula dispenser makes feeding time easier when you and your baby are out and about. Each layer container is individually sealed to ensure food stays fresh. In addition to formula, the generous storage space means that the dispenser can also be used to store accessories such as fruit, baby snacks, solid baby food and pacifiers, making it convenient and practical to meet your baby's outdoor needs. Just stack as many containers as you need, and put them in your diaper bag for a day of fun. Have a very good day~ Note: 1. The color in the photo may vary slightly due to lighting and different screen. 2. Please allow 1-3 cm deviation due to manual measurement.

reviews.reviewText: The product I received is different in color and different from the picture. However it does the job.

reviews.reviewTitle: Essential for BLW and bottle-fed babies
reviews.reviewText: EN: I easily organize my baby's food in these containers when we have to go out and his mealtime will be away from home. I can separate each meal and easily offer it according to my baby's needs. It also has a dispenser for powdered milk so in each container I place the necessary amount that I will use for each bottle, especially when I leave my baby in the care of someone else and I want to make sure that the measurements are exact.Perfect for traveling! We recently traveled to an all-inclusive hotel, with buffets, and it was very easy to always have food on hand for my baby (fruits, proteins, cereals), because I organized his meals in these containers.It doesn't take up much space in the fridge.FR: J'organise facilement la nourriture de mon bébé dans ces contenants lorsque nous devons sortir et que son repas sera loin de la maison. Je peux séparer chaque repas et le proposer facilement selon les besoins de mon bébé. Il dispose également d'un distributeur de lait en poudre, donc dans chaque récipient je place la quantité nécessaire que j'utiliserai pour chaque biberon, surtout lorsque je laisse mon bébé sous la garde de quelqu'un d'autre et que je veux m'assurer que les mesures sont exactes.Parfait pour voyager! Nous avons récemment voyagé dans un hôtel tout compris, avec buffets, et il était très facile d'avoir toujours de la nourriture sous la main pour mon bébé (fruits, protéines, céréales).Cela ne prend pas beaucoup de place dans le réfrigérateur.
